amendment.description: Amendment expresses the sense of Congress that the Serbian and Yugoslav Governments should immediately account for all Kosovar Albanians held in their prisons and treat them in accordance with all applicable international standards.
amendment.purpose: An amendment, no. 37, printed in Part B, H.Rept. 106-235 to express the Sense of the Congress that the Serbian and Yugoslav Governments should immediately account for all Kosovar Albanians held in their prisons and treat them in accordance with all applicable international standards.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Engel amendment (A020) Agreed to by recorded vote: 424 - 0 (Roll no. 329).
